de.mrapp.android.dialog.model

Interface HeaderDialog

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Dialog, android.content.DialogInterface, HeaderDialogDecorator, MaterialDialog, MaterialDialogDecorator
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ButtonBarDialog, ListDialog, ValidateableDialog
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractButtonBarDialog, AbstractHeaderDialog, AbstractHeaderDialogFragment, AbstractListDialog, AbstractValidateableDialog, MaterialDialog, ProgressDialog, WizardDialog

    public interface HeaderDialog
extends MaterialDialog, HeaderDialogDecorator
    Defines the interface a dialog, which is designed according to Android 5's Material design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices and may contain a header, must implement.
    Since:
    3.2.0
